hero.headline: Malware Analysis, Cybersecurity & IT Knowledge
hero.subline: DaonWare offers you practical insights into malware analysis, cybersecurity and digital forensics. Here you will find tips, tutorials and analyses for beginners and professionals – always with the goal of protecting you from threats on the web.

services.title: Malware Analysis
services.description: Practical analysis of malware, tools and forensics, education and protection measures. For beginners and professionals: Learn how malware works and how to protect yourself.

services.title: Cybersecurity
services.description: Protection against phishing, scams and exploits. TryHackMe, HackTheBox, tips, tutorials and analyses. Slogan: Always be suspicious and don't get caught off guard!

services.title: 3D Modeling
services.description: From stylish poly-art to realistic details: I create 3D models for characters and environments that bring your vision to life.

about.title: About DaonWare
about.text: DaonWare offers expertise in IT security, forensics and software development.

intro.headline: Malware Analysis, Cybersecurity & IT Knowledge
intro.text: DaonWare offers you practical insights into malware analysis, cybersecurity and digital forensics. Here you will find tips, tutorials and analyses for beginners and professionals – always with the goal of protecting you from threats on the web.

articles.title: Articles & Success Stories
articles.description: In the articles you will find exciting insights into my projects, tutorials and success stories about cybersecurity, malware analysis and IT.
